location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: A sketch map showing the portions of Faddaghiyeh Estate in Shatt Al Arab Delta

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Pencil, pen and ink with crayon on tracing paperDimensions:180 x 330 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Hand drawn sketch map produced to illustrate the land dispute related to date gardens case enclosed with a letter dated 24th May 1933 from Harold Richard Patrick Dickson (folios 206-207).Shows land along the Shatt al Arab owned by the Sheikh of Kuwait with plots lettered for reference and a key inserted at the upper left-hand corner. Accompanied by an explanatory notes (folios 210-212).
